'''Small Atmospheric Vortexes''' are a type of [[Obstacle]] and exploration mechanic in found in Sumeru. They are small stationary spherical objects. Coming into contact with them will knock the player back but will not cause damage. They can be dispelled using [[Jinni in the Magic Bottle — Liloupar]].
